name: EVERYTHING IS TERRIBLE
description:
Build your fortune, and may greed not consume you.

My second game as of now, I hope you all have fun with what I've put together.
I've had to cut down to a lot of stuff,  as I didn't have a lot of free time.

but still, I hope you enjoy

HTML MAY BE LAGGY, THE EXECUTABLE IS RECOMMENDED.

LINUX AND MACINTOSH PORTS HAVE NOT BEEN THOROUGHLY TESTED.

REPORT ANY BUGS AND THOUGHTS FOUND IN THE GAME.

Submission for the Godot Wild Jam #5

a game by the Friendly Void.
